model_answer: The answer is A/B/C. Events 10, 9, and 6 directly set up and cause the final reveal in the countdown by building anticipation and establishing the ranking of the countries that will be revealed in event 11.

The answer is A/B/C. The early Passport Kings branding and website visuals in Event 0 set expectations for later calls to action, which were reinforced by the on-screen “Passport Kings” like-and-subscribe graphic during the Nigeria segment in Event 5. Additionally, the travel-hacking promo with on-screen messaging in Event 6 directly preceded and modeled the final CTA style, which was the final call to action in Event 12. The Angola country segment in Event 7 did not include a CTA focus.
